TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Timeline extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable
Public MustInherit Class Timeline Inherits Animatable

summary.span: 定义一个时间段。

span.span: Defines a segment of time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时间线表示时间段。A timeline represents a segment of time. 它提供的属性让你可以指定该时间段的长度、开始时间、重复次数、该时间段内时间进度的快慢等。It provides properties that enable you to specify the length of that segment, when it should start, how many times it will repeat, how fast time progresses in that segment, and more. 从时间线类继承的类可提供附加功能，例如动画和媒体播放。Classes that inherit from the timeline class provide additional functionality, such as animation and media playback. 下面是一些可用的不同类型的专用时间线的示例。The following are examples of some of the different types of specialized timelines available. - **动画**： 是一种生成输出值的时间线类型。**Animations**: An is a type of timeline that produces output values. 将动画与属性关联时，动画会在其播放时更新属性的值，从而对其进行 "动画处理"。When you associate an animation with a property, the animation updates the property's value as it plays, thereby "animating" it. 有关动画的简介，请参阅[动画概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md)。For an introduction to animations, see [Animation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md). 有关应用动画的不同方法的信息，请参阅[属性动画技术概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/property-animation-techniques-overview.md)。For information about the different ways to apply animations, see the [Property Animation Techniques Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/property-animation-techniques-overview.md). - **MediaTimelines**： 是一种用于控制播放媒体文件的时间线。**MediaTimelines**: A is a type of timeline that controls the playback of a media file. - **ParallelTimelines**： 是一种将其他时间线分组的时间线类型。**ParallelTimelines**: A is a type of timeline that groups other timelines. - **情节提要**： 是一种特殊类型的 ，它为其包含的时间线提供对象和属性目标信息。**Storyboards**: A is a special type of that provides object and property targeting information for the timelines it contains. 有关 对象的详细信息，请参阅[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。For more information about objects, see the [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md). 有关使用时间线的详细信息，请参阅[动画概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md)。For more information about using timelines, see the [Animation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md). 有关时间线的计时功能的简介，请参阅[计时行为概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-behaviors-overview.md)。For an introduction to the timing features of timelines, see the [Timing Behaviors Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-behaviors-overview.md). ## 数据绑定和动画处理时间线Data Binding and Animating Timelines 大多数时间线属性可以是数据绑定的或动态的;但是，由于计时系统的工作方式，数据绑定或动画时间线的行为与其他数据绑定或动画对象的行为不同。Most timeline properties can be data bound or animated; however, because of the way the timing system works, data bound or animated timelines do not behave like other data bound or animated objects. 若要了解其行为，有助于理解激活时间线的方式。To understand their behavior, it helps to understand what it means to activate a timeline. 应用时间线时，将生成时间线及其子时间线的副本。When a timeline is applied, copies are made of the timeline and its child timelines. 这些副本会被冻结（变为只读），并从它们创建 对象。These copies are frozen (made read-only) and objects are created from them. 这就是对目标属性进行动画处理的实际工作所用的时钟。It's these clocks that do the actual work of animating the targeted properties. 如果时间线是数据绑定的或动态的，则在创建其时钟时，将生成其当前值的快照。If a timeline was data bound or animated, a snapshot of its current values was made when its clock was created. 即使原始时间线可能会继续更改，时钟也不会更改。Even though the original timeline might continue to change, its clock does not. 要使时间线反映数据绑定或动画更改，必须重新生成时钟。For a timeline to reflect data binding or animation changes, its clock must be regenerated. 系统不会自动生成时钟。Clocks are not regenerated for you automatically. 以下是应用时间线更改的几种方法：The following are several ways to apply timeline changes: - 如果时间线是或属于 ，则可以通过使用 或 方法重新应用它的情节提要，使其反映更改。If the timeline is or belongs to a , you can make it reflect changes by reapplying its storyboard using a or the method. 这还会产生重新启动动画的附带影响。This has the side effect of also restarting the animation. 在代码中，可以使用 方法将演示图板前进到其之前的位置。In code, you can use the method to advance the storyboard back to its previous position. - 如果使用 方法将动画直接应用到属性，请再次调用 方法并向其传递已修改的动画。If you applied an animation directly to a property using the method, call the method again and pass it the animation that's been modified. - 如果要直接在时钟级别上工作，请创建并应用一组新的时钟，然后用它们替换之前生成的一组时钟。If you are working directly at the clock level, create and apply a new set of clocks and use them to replace the previous set of generated clocks. 有关数据绑定动画的示例，请参阅[主曲线动画示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。For an example of a data bound animation, see the [Key Spline Animation Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011) . ## 使用时间线作为计时器Using a Timeline as a Timer 仅当存在与其相关联的事件处理程序时，或（在 对象的情况下）与属性关联时，时间线的时钟才会进行。A timeline's clock will only progress when there's an event handler associated with it or (in the case of an object) it is associated with a property. 出于此原因（以及其他），不建议将 用作计时器。For this reason (and others), it's not recommended that you use a as a timer.

span.span: Animation Timing Behavior Sample

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double AccelerationRatio { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.AccelerationRatio : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在将时间消逝从零加速到其最大速率的过程中所占用时间线的 的百分比。

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying the percentage of the timeline's spent accelerating the passage of time from zero to its maximum rate.

value.span: 一个介于 0 和 1 之间的值（包括 0 和 1），该值指定在将时间消逝从零加速到其最大速率的过程所占用时间线的 的百分比。

span.span: A value between 0 and 1, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of the timeline's spent accelerating the passage of time from zero to its maximum rate.

value.span: 如果同时设置时间线的 属性，则 和 之和必须小于等于 1。

span.span: If the timeline's property is also set, the sum of and must be less than or equal to 1.

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以创建缓慢启动的动画，并随着时间的推移而加速。Use the property to create animations that start slowly and then speed up as time progresses. 属性可用于创建缓动效果或使移动看起来更加自然。The property is useful for creating ease-in effects or making movement seem more natural. 使用 "" 和 "" 属性来创建在完成前速度缓慢、速度快、再减速的动画。Use the and properties together to create animations that start slowly, speed up, and then slow down again before finishing. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than 1.
The sum of and exceeds 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 方法调用，不应由您的代码直接调用。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly by your code.

para.span: 如果 的实施者具有应与类一起使用的相应自定义时钟，则应重写此方法。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoReverse { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoReverse : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示时间线在完成向前迭代后是否按相反的顺序播放。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the timeline plays in reverse after it completes a forward iteration.

value.span: 如果时间线在每次迭代结束时按相反的顺序播放，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the timeline plays in reverse at the end of each iteration; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性设置为 `true`，则时间线将播放其 属性所指定的时间长度的两倍。If the property is set to `true`, the timeline plays for twice the length of time specified by its property. ### System.windows.media.animation.timeline.autoreverse 和重复AutoReverse and Repetitions 当时间线的 属性设置为 `true` 并且其 属性导致其重复时，每个向前迭代都将后跟一个反向迭代。When a timeline's property is set to `true` and its property causes it to repeat, each forward iteration is followed by a backward iteration. 这会导致重复一次。This makes one repetition. 例如，迭代 为2的 值为 `true` 的时间线将向前播放一次，然后向后播放，然后再次向后播放。For example, a timeline with an value of `true` with an iteration of 2 would play forward once, then backwards, then forwards again, and then backwards again. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

Public Shared ReadOnly AutoReverseProperty As DependencyProperty

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property BeginTime As Nullable(Of TimeSpan)
public: property Nullable<TimeSpan> BeginTime { Nullable<TimeSpan> get(); void set(Nullable<TimeSpan> value); };
member this.BeginTime : Nullable<TimeSpan> with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置此 应开始的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the time at which this should begin.

value.span: 相对于其父级的 ，此 应开始的时间。

span.span: The time at which this should begin, relative to its parent's .

value.span: 如果此时间线为根时间线，则该时间相对于其交互开始时间（触发时间线的时刻）。

span.span: If this timeline is a root timeline, the time is relative to its interactive begin time (the moment at which the timeline was triggered).

value.span: 此值可能为正数、负数或 ； 值表示永远不会播放该时间线。

span.span: This value may be positive, negative, or ; a value means the timeline never plays.

value.span: 默认值为零。

span.span: The default value is zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可用于创建按顺序播放的时间线：通过增加共享同一父项的连续时间线的 ，可以错开其播放时间。The property is useful for creating timelines that play in a sequence: by increasing the of successive timelines that share the same parent, you can stagger their play times. ## 负值Negative Values 负值 值使 的行为如同过去一段时间内的情况。A negative value causes a to behave as though it started at some time in the past. 例如，如果 的 为2.5 秒， 为5秒，则会在启动时显示为半双向完成。For example, a with a of negative 2.5 seconds and a of 5 seconds will appear to be half-way finished when it starts. ## System.windows.media.animation.timeline.begintime 和 SpeedRatioBeginTime and SpeedRatio 属性描述的时间以时间线的 parent's 时间度量。The time described by the property is measured in the timeline's parent's time. 例如， 为5的时间线（其父 为2）实际上在2.5 秒后开始。For example, a timeline with a of 5 whose parent has a of 2 actually starts after 2.5 seconds. 时间线自己的 设置不会影响其 。A timeline's own setting does not affect its . 例如，时间线的 为5秒， 为2，而 为1的父时间线在5秒后开始，而不是2.5。For example, a timeline with a of 5 seconds, a of 2, and a parent timeline with a of 1 starts after 5 seconds, not 2.5. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage \<*对象*= "[-] [*days*.]*小时*：*分钟*：*秒*[。*fractionalSeconds*] "/>\<*object* ="[-][*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*:*seconds*[.*fractionalSeconds*]"/> -或--or- \<*对象*= "[-] [*days*.]*小时*：*分钟*"/>\<*object* ="[-][*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*"/> -或--or- \<*对象*= "[-]*days*"/>\<*object* ="[-]*days*"/> -或--or- \<*对象*= "{[x:Null 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/>\<*object* ="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/> ## XAML 值XAML Values 方括号（`[` 和 `]`）中的项是可选的。Items in square brackets (`[` and `]`) are optional. *天数**days* 一个大于或等于0的值，该值描述此开始时间跨越的天数。A value greater than or equal to 0 that describes the number of days spanned by this begin time. *小时数**hours* 一个介于0和23之间的值，表示此开始时间跨越的小时数。A value between 0 and 23 that represents the number of hours spanned by this begin time. *分钟数**minutes* 一个介于0和59之间的值，该值表示此开始时间跨越的分钟数。A value between 0 and 59 that represents the number of minutes spanned by this begin time. *seconds**seconds* 一个介于0和59之间的值，该值表示此开始时间跨越的秒数。A value between 0 and 59 that represents the number of seconds spanned by this begin time. *fractionalSeconds**fractionalSeconds* 由1到7位数字组成的值，表示秒的小数部分。A value consisting of 1 to 7 digits that represents fractional seconds. 有关完整的 语法，请参阅 页的 "备注" 部分。For the complete syntax, see the Remarks section of the page. ## Examples 时间线的 属性确定时间线的活动期的开始时间。A timeline's property determines the beginning of a timeline's active period. 如果时间线具有父时间线，则 属性决定时间线在其父项启动后的启动时间。If the timeline has a parent timeline, the property determines how long it takes the timeline to start after its parent starts. 如果时间线是根时间线（例如 ），则 属性确定时间线在触发后开始播放的时间。If the timeline is a root timeline (a , for example), the property determines how long the timeline takes to start playing after it is triggered. 下面的示例显示了几个具有不同 设置的不同时间线。The following example shows several different timelines with different settings. [!code-xaml[timingbehaviors_snip#_graphicsmm_BeginTimeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/timingbehaviors_snip/CSharp/BeginTimeExample.xaml#_graphicsmm_begintimeexamplewholepage)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成冻结 对象（或任何 对象）的可修改副本。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法使用强类型实现隐藏了继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成冻结 对象（或任何 对象）的可修改副本。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法使用强类型实现隐藏了继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Completed As EventHandler

summary.span: 当此时间线完全播放完毕时发生：它将不再进入其活动周期。

span.span: Occurs when this timeline has completely finished playing: it will no longer enter its active period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此时间线是时间线树的根时间线，则该时间线在到达其活动周期的结束时间（包括重复项）后已完成播放，其所有子项已到达活动期间的结束时间。If this timeline is the root timeline of a timeline tree, it has completed playing after it reaches the end of its active period (which includes repeats) and all its children have reached the end of their active periods. 如果此时间线是子时间线，则当其所属的时间线树的根时间线达到其活动期的终点并且其所有子时间线都已完成播放时，它将被视为已完全完成播放。If this timeline is a child timeline, it is considered to have completely finished playing when the root timeline of the timeline tree to which it belongs reaches the end of its active period and all its child timelines have finished playing. 停止时间线不会触发其已完成的事件，但会将其跳过填充时间段。Stopping a timeline does not trigger its completed event, but skipping it to its fill period does. 事件处理程序的 参数是时间线的 。The parameter of the event handler is the timeline's . 尽管此事件处理程序似乎与时间线关联，但它实际上注册了为此时间线创建的 。Although this event handler appears to be associated with a timeline, it actually registers with the created for this timeline. 有关详细信息，请参阅[计时事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md)。For more information, see the [Timing Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md). ## Examples 在下面的示例中，两个 对象用于在两个图像之间创建动画过渡，并使用 对象存储，并使用 控件进行显示。In the following example, two objects are used to create an animation transition between two images, stored using objects and displayed using an control. 一个情节提要收缩图像控件，直到它消失。One storyboard shrinks the image control until it disappears. 完成后，旧的 将与另一个 交换，第二个情节提要将展开图像控件，直到再次调整图像大小。After it completes, the old is swapped with the other , and a second storyboard that expands the image control until it is full-sized again. [!code-xaml[timingbehaviors_snip#TimelineCompletedExampleMarkupUsingWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/timingbehaviors_snip/CSharp/TimelineCompletedExample.xaml#timelinecompletedexamplemarkupusingwholepage)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated As EventHandler

summary.span: 在时间线时钟的时间前进速率发生变化时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the rate at which time progresses for the timeline's clock changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在以下情况下，时间线时钟的当前全局速度发生变化：The current global speed of a timeline's clock changes in the following circumstances: - 由于其时间线的 设置，时钟会改变方向。The clock changes direction because of its timeline's setting. - 由于其时间线的 或 属性设置，因此时钟加速或减速。The clock accelerates or decelerates because of its timeline's or property settings. - 时钟已暂停或恢复。The clock is paused or resumed. - 时钟变为非活动状态或重新激活。The clock becomes inactive or reactivates. - 某个时钟父项的 更改。The of one of the clock's parent changes. 事件可用于在时间线时钟暂停时进行跟踪;在事件处理程序中，使用情节提要的 方法或检查时钟的 属性以确定其时钟是否暂停;将此值与以前缓存的值进行比较，以确定其是否已更改。The event is useful for tracking when a timeline's clock becomes paused; in your event handler, use your storyboard's method or check the clock's property to determine whether its clock is paused; compare this against a previously cached value to determine whether it changed. 事件处理程序的 参数是时间线的 。The parameter of the event handler is the timeline's . 尽管此事件处理程序似乎与时间线关联，但它实际上注册了为此时间线创建的 。Although this event handler appears to be associated with a timeline, it actually registers with the created for this timeline. 有关详细信息，请参阅[计时事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md)。For more information, see the [Timing Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何注册 事件。The following example shows how to register for the event. [!code-csharp[timingbehaviors_procedural_snip#TimelineCurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidatedExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/timingbehaviors_procedural_snip/CSharp/TimelineCurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidatedExample.cs#timelinecurrentglobalspeedinvalidatedexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[timingbehaviors_procedural_snip#TimelineCurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidatedExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/timingbehaviors_procedural_snip/visualbasic/timelinecurrentglobalspeedinvalidatedexample.vb#timelinecurrentglobalspeedinvalidatedexamplewholepage)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CurrentStateInvalidated As EventHandler

summary.span: 更新时间线的 的 属性时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property of the timeline's is updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望在时间线的 开始、停止或填充时收到通知，请使用 事件。Use the event when you want to be notified when a timeline's starts, stops, or fills. 暂停 不会更改其 。Pausing a does not change its . 若要在时钟暂停时得到通知，请使用 事件。To be notified when a clock becomes paused, use the event. 尽管此事件在 变为无效时发生，但并不一定表示 更改：从 切换到 然后再返回到相同勾选标记 的 将导致激发此事件，但其 属性不会实际更改。Although this event occurs when the becomes invalid, that doesn't necessarily mean the changed: a that switches from to and then back to in the same tick will cause this event to fire, but its property won't actually change. 事件处理程序的 参数是为此时间线创建的 。The parameter of the event handler is the that was created for this timeline. 尽管此事件处理程序似乎与时间线关联，但它实际上注册了为此时间线创建的 。Although this event handler appears to be associated with a timeline, it actually registers with the created for this timeline. 有关详细信息，请参阅[计时事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md)。For more information, see the [Timing Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md).

span.span: Occurs when the property of the timeline's is updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望在更新时间线的 时收到通知，请使用 事件。Use the event when you want to be notified when the of a timeline's is updated. 事件处理程序的 参数是时间线的 。The parameter of the event handler is the timeline's . 尽管此事件处理程序似乎与时间线关联，但它实际上注册了为此时间线创建的 。Although this event handler appears to be associated with a timeline, it actually registers with the created for this timeline. 有关详细信息，请参阅[计时事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md)。For more information, see the [Timing Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何注册 事件。The following example shows how to register for the event. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在将时间消逝从其最大速率减速到零的过程中所占用时间线的 的百分比。

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying the percentage of the timeline's spent decelerating the passage of time from its maximum rate to zero.

value.span: 一个介于 0 和 1 之间的值（包括 0 和 1），用于指定在将时间消逝从其最大速率减速到零所占用时间线的 的百分比。

span.span: A value between 0 and 1, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of the timeline's spent decelerating the passage of time from its maximum rate to zero.

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以创建在停止之前减速的动画。Use the property to create animations that slow down before stopping. 属性可用于创建缓动效果或使移动看起来更加自然。The property is useful for creating ease-in effects or making movement seem more natural. 使用 "" 和 "" 属性来创建在完成前速度缓慢、速度快、再减速的动画。Use the and properties together to create animations that start slowly, speed up, and then slow down again before finishing. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than 1.
The sum of and exceeds 1.

summary.span: 标识 依赖属性。

span.span: Identifies for the dependency property.

summary.span: 获取或设置此时间线及其子时间线所需的帧速率。

span.span: Gets or sets the desired frame rate for this timeline and its child timelines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以定义应在其中运行动画的特定帧速率。Use this property to define a specific frame rate at which animations should run.这只是一条指导原则，不是一个保证值。  This is a guideline only, and is not a guaranteed value. 此属性有两个主要用途：This property has two primary uses: - 限制不需要高度保真的缓慢移动背景类型动画的处理资源量。Limiting the amount of processing resources for slow-moving, background type animations that do not require a high degree of fidelity. 这可以通过在时间线上设置一个小帧速率值来实现。This can be achieved by setting a small frame rate value on the timeline. - 降低图像的快速移动水平动画的视觉效果。Reducing the visual impact of tearing on fast-moving horizontal animations. 为此，可以在时间线上设置较高的帧速率值。This can be achieved by setting a high frame rate value on the timeline. 只能在根时间线上设置此属性。This property may only be set on a root timeline. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 DesiredFrameRate 属性将多个动画的数量限制为10帧/秒。The following example uses the DesiredFrameRate property to limit several animations to 10 frames per second. [!code-xaml[timingbehaviors_snip#GraphicsMMDesiredFrameRateExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/timingbehaviors_snip/CSharp/DesiredFrameRateExample.xaml#GraphicsMMDesiredFrameRateExample)]

span.span: Animation Overview

summary.span: 获取或设置此时间线播放的时间长度，而不是计数重复。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time for which this timeline plays, not counting repetitions.

value.span: 时间线的简单持续时间：此时间线完成一次向前迭代所花费的时间。

span.span: The timeline's simple duration: the amount of time this timeline takes to complete a single forward iteration.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 时间线的简单持续时间表示一次向前迭代的时间与总播放时间的时间，包括重复。A timeline's simple duration constitutes the time for a single forward iteration versus the total play time, which includes repetitions. ## 默认持续时间行为Default Duration Behavior 值为 的 结构的行为取决于时间线的类型：The behavior of a structure with a value of depends on the type of timeline: |**线****Timeline**|**行为****Behavior**| |-|-| ||不确定（ 为抽象）Undetermined ( is abstract)| |、,

、,

|扩展以适应子时间线Expands to fit child timelines| |\<*类型*> 动画（称为 "From/To/By" 或 "基本" 动画）\<*Type*>Animation (Known as a "From/To/By" or "basic" animations)|1 秒1 second| |\<*类型*> AnimationUsingKeyFrames （称为关键帧动画）\<*Type*>AnimationUsingKeyFrames (Known as key frame animations)|所有关键帧 值的总和Sum of all key frame values| ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 和 是 对象的类型。 and are types of objects. 的持续时间取决于其子时间线的持续时间。The duration of a is determined by the duration of its child timelines. 例如，下面的 将运行六秒钟（持续时间为6秒），因为它的最后一个子时间线（）结束。For example, the below will run for six seconds (duration of 6 seconds) because that is when its last child Timeline () ends. > [!NOTE] > 注意：下面的示例中省略了代码，这些示例仅为说明用作其他用途提供。Note: code has been omitted from the following examples, which are provided for illustrative purposed only. [xaml][xaml] ``` ... ... ``` \<*类型*> 动画的示例包括 、、等。如果没有为这些类型的动画指定 ，则它们将运行一秒钟。Examples of \<*Type*>Animations include , , , etc. If no is specified for these types of animations, they will run for one second. [xaml][xaml] ``` ... ... ``` \<*类型*> 的示例包括 、等。如果没有为这些类型的动画指定 ，它们将一直运行，直到完成所有关键帧。Examples of \<*Type*>AnimationUsingKeyFrames include , , etc. If no is specified for these types of animations they will run until all key frames are finished. [xaml][xaml] ``` ... ... ```

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 在到达其有效期末尾后的行为。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the behaves after it reaches the end of its active period.

value.span: 一个值，该值指定时间线在到达其有效期末尾后但其父级仍处于其有效期或填充期时的行为表现。

span.span: A value that specifies how the timeline behaves after it reaches the end of its active period but its parent is inside its active or fill period.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置动画 属性，使动画在其活动周期结束后保存其值时 。Set an animations property to when you want the animation to hold its value after it reaches the end of its active period. 已到达其 "" 设置为 "" 的活动期结束的动画被称为 "填充期"。An animation that has reached the end of its active period that has a setting of is said to be in its fill period. 当不希望动画在其活动周期结束后保存其值时，请设置其When you don't want an animation to hold its value after it reaches the end of its active period, set its 属性以 。 property to . 由于其填充期内的动画会继续替代其目标属性的值，因此尝试通过其他方式设置目标属性的值可能看起来不起作用。Because an animation in its fill period continues to override its target property's value, attempting to set the target property's value through other means might appear to have no effect. 有关演示如何在对属性值进行动画处理后设置该属性值的示例，请参阅[如何：使用情节提要对属性进行动画处理后设置该属性](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-set-a-property-after-animating-it-with-a-storyboard.md)。For an example showing how to set a property value after it has been animated, see [How to: Set a Property After Animating It with a Storyboard](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-set-a-property-after-animating-it-with-a-storyboard.md). 子时间线在其父时间线停止时停止播放并填充;如果要填充子时间线，请确保其父时间线的 为 。A child timeline stops playing and filling when its parent timeline stops; if you want a child timeline to fill, make sure its parent timeline has a of . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 使此 成为不可修改的，或确定是否可使其成为不可修改的。

span.span: Makes this unmodifiable or determines whether it can be made unmodifiable.

returns.span: 当 为 true 时，如果此实例可以成为只读，则此方法返回 ，如果无法成为只读，则返回 。

span.span: If is true, this method returns if this instance can be made read-only, or if it cannot be made read-only.

returns.span: 当 为 false 时，如果此实例现在为只读，则此方法返回 ，如果它不能成为只读并且具有已开始更改此对象冻结状态的副作用，则返回 。

span.span: If is false, this method returns if this instance is now read-only, or if it cannot be made read-only, with the side effect of having begun to change the frozen status of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请勿直接调用此方法（在实现中调用基时除外）。Do not call this method directly (except when calling base in an implementation). 此方法由 在内部调用。This method is called internally by .

para.span: 如果类包含未使用依赖项属性存储的数据，则 实现程序必须重写此方法。

span.span: implementers must override this method when the class contains data that is not stored using dependency properties.

para.span: 典型的实现将调用 base，然后对类所包含的所有 类型属性调用静态 方法，仅当所有属性都已冻结时（如果通过 的 值传递，则返回 ）。

span.span: A typical implementation would call base, then call the static method on all typed properties that the class contains, returning only if all properties were frozen (or could have been frozen, in the case of passing through a value for ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values. 请注意，如果这些属性包含资源引用或数据绑定，则在尝试冻结对象并将引发 将失败。Note that if these properties contain resource references or data bindings, will fail when trying to freeze the object and will throw an . 此方法由 方法调用，不应在代码中直接调用，除非在重写此方法时调用基实现。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要创建当前对象的冻结副本，请调用 ，而不是直接调用此方法。To create a frozen copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

summary.span: 使此实例成为指定 的冻结复本。

span.span: Makes this instance a frozen clone of the specified .

summary.span: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

span.span: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 属性设置为 时，才应调用此方法。This method should only be called when the property is set to . 如果 ，则自然持续时间由 的特定类实现确定。If is , the natural duration is determined by that particular class's implementation of . 如果 返回 ，则表示自然持续时间未知，这表示 的自然持续时间。If returns , it means that the natural duration is unknown, which implies a natural duration of . 这就是流式处理媒体的情况。Such is the case for streaming media. 请注意，将此方法传递到为此时间线创建的时钟以外的时钟是可行的，但会提供不可靠的结果。Note that passing this method a clock other than the one that was created for this timeline is possible, but will provide unreliable results.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RemoveRequested As EventHandler

summary.span: 当移除为此时间线创建的时钟或其中一个父时间线时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the clock created for this timeline or one of its parent timelines is removed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用情节提要的 方法将 操作应用于情节提要，或调用 方法（直接使用时钟）来引发此事件。This event is raised by applying a action to a storyboard, using a Storyboard's method, or (when working directly with clocks) calling the method. 尽管此事件处理程序似乎与时间线关联，但它实际上注册了为此时间线创建的 。Although this event handler appears to be associated with a timeline, it actually registers with the created for this timeline. 有关详细信息，请参阅[计时事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md)。For more information, see the [Timing Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Animation::RepeatBehavior RepeatBehavior { System::Windows::Media::Animation::RepeatBehavior get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Animation::RepeatBehavior value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此时间线的重复行为。

span.span: Gets or sets the repeating behavior of this timeline.

value.span: 迭代 ，指定时间线应播放的次数； 值，指定时间线活动期间的总的时间长度；或者特殊值 ，指定时间线将不限次数地重复播放。

span.span: An iteration that specifies the number of times the timeline should play, a value that specifies the total the length of this timeline's active period, or the special value , which specifies that the timeline should repeat indefinitely.

value.span: 默认值为 ，其 为1，表示时间线播放一次。

span.span: The default value is a with a of 1, which indicates that the timeline plays once.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定迭代 并且时间线的 属性设置为 `true`，则单个重复项由一个向前迭代和一个反向迭代组成。If an iteration is specified and the timeline's property is set to `true`, a single repetition consists of one forward iteration and one backward iteration. 属性设置为 true 的时间线，迭代 2 将向前播放，然后向后播放，然后再次向后播放。A timeline with an property set to true an iteration of 2 would play forwards, then backwards, then forwards again, and then backwards again. 您还可以指定希望时间线播放的总时间长度，而不是指定时间线的播放次数。Instead of specifying the number of times a timeline plays, you can also specify the total length of time you want the timeline to play. 要使时间线重复，此 值应大于时间线的 。For a timeline to repeat, this value should be greater than the timeline's . 例如，时间线的 为2秒， 为4秒，则播放两次。For example, a timeline with a of 2 seconds and a of 4 seconds will play twice. 如果 小于时间线的 ，则缩短时间线的活动期间。If the is less than the timeline's , the timeline's active period is cut short. 有关重复时间线的详细信息，请参阅[动画概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md)。For more information about repeating timelines, see [Animation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double SpeedRatio { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.SpeedRatio : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置此 的时间相对于其父级的前进速率。

span.span: Gets or sets the rate, relative to its parent, at which time progresses for this .

value.span: 一个大于 0 的有限值，表示此时间线的时间相对于其父级的前进速率；如果此时间线为根时间线，则为默认时间线速度。

span.span: A finite value greater than 0 that describes the rate at which time progresses for this timeline, relative to the speed of the timeline's parent or, if this is a root timeline, the default timeline speed.

value.span: 默认值为 1。

span.span: The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时间线的 设置对其 不起作用;该时间相对于时间线的父项，或者，如果时间线为根时间线，则为时间线时钟的开始时间。A timeline's setting does not have an effect on its ; that time is relative to the timeline's parent or, if the timeline is a root timeline, the moment at which the timeline's clock was begun. 如果指定 或 ，则此 是时间线自然长度的平均比率。If or are specified, this is the average ratio over the natural length of the timeline. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 时间线的 属性可控制其相对于其父级的进度率。A timeline's property controls its rate of progress, relative to its parent. 如果时间线是根，则其 相对于默认时间线速度。If the timeline is a root, its is relative to the default timeline speed. 下面的示例显示了几个具有不同 设置的时间线。The following example shows several timelines with different settings. [!code-xaml[timingbehaviors_snip#_graphicsmm_SpeedExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/timingbehaviors_snip/CSharp/SpeedExample.xaml#_graphicsmm_speedexamplewholepage)]

exception.span: 小于 0 或并非有限值。

span.span: is less than 0 or is not a finite value.
